extendedInfo.description: Firefly Live WallpaperIt is a FREE live wallpaper which consist 4 sets of different firefly scenery.For more customization, please kindly enter to Setting > Wallpaper Editor. You may change the transition, transparent, color and more.It's time to change!

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: A wonderful app.. beautiful and sleek on an android device. Best live wallpaper 4me
reviews.author: Angel Bernadine Amakeze

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: I love this wallpaper. It is by far the best one yet, and my favorite one. Great job, thank you. I would recommend this wallpaper a hundred times over
reviews.author: Calista Whitehouse

reviews.title: Fireflies just go \"up\".. ?
reviews.comment: Why? They should be at various speeds and directions.  I use to always love this lwp!! Just want that fixed, please! Update: They are okay except for one background. I still love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beautiful!
reviews.comment: I love this wallpaper!  The animations are great and the scenes are beautiful. My only wish is that I could select which scene out of the theme that shows on my phone. Otherwise,  I highly recommend it.
reviews.author: Lisa Ijames

reviews.title: So Entertaining
reviews.comment: What a beautiful wallpaper this is. Best thing is so many options for customization & shoortcut to settings. Loving it.
reviews.author: Kashif Bashir

reviews.title: Serene and beautiful
reviews.comment: Love the 4 scenes, would love to see a additional ones. Day/night would be nice.
reviews.author: Suki Niko

reviews.title: Absolutely \342\231\245 it
reviews.comment: Love love love this wallpaper!!! Now lets get a setting to change the color of the fireflies (individually or by group)
reviews.author: Courtney Davidson

reviews.title: Cat Morgan
reviews.comment: This is really beautiful - it\'s also friendly (doesn\'t make demands of your attn or phone) very peaceful - lots of customization - & it\'s free (^_^)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gud
reviews.comment: I had it earlier, it was gud den it just vanished from my phone!!!! After sumtime I searched and I found it again but dis time..... I think d app deserves 10 stars!!!its beautiful!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice!
reviews.comment: It\'s very calming when you see all the fireflies in the different settings.. Good app to change your moods...
reviews.author: Marie Mercado

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Ok; not very good . Because in this live wallpaper only one third part is shown in our mobile.
reviews.author: Shubham Deshmukh

reviews.title: soo nice
reviews.comment: i hope there will be more ^_^ <3<3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Magical....
reviews.comment: Feels like my own fairy land on the screen of my phone
reviews.author: Queena Dupree

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: Okay. This is gorgeous to stare at for starters but the fact that u have options to move things around, customize yourself! Pretty cool. I gave it 4 though bc even though It\'s neat & pretty there is still only a few pages to look @.
reviews.author: wendy carella

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Very good live wallpaper for me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Firefly live wallpaper
reviews.comment: Love it. Love all four options it gives you. The other apps it brings up are a little annoying. But it\'s so pretty.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kicker!!
reviews.comment: I get a kick out of how I can put shortcuts on the fireflies ^.^
reviews.author: Denise Garnand

reviews.title: Natural
reviews.comment: Very nice..water, leaves should be moving n sounding. ..other than its sooo beeeauuutifull \342\230\206\342\230\206
reviews.author: Richi Kt

reviews.title: Pretty theme, nice glow ...
reviews.comment: Very visually pleasing with soothing glow of the fireflies ... customizing is a tad tedious ... still nice overall .... thank you ... will keep an eye out for new apps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mangla Media
reviews.comment: The best Live Wallpaper app I\'ve used because not only is it a great quality picture you can make your very own Live Wallpaper with any pictur you choose but does have when trying to find the right size picture as you always the original wallpaper showing so please developer\'s give us a recomended picture size??
reviews.author: Richard Mordew
